Detailed Description

for_stmt: A parsed for statement in the language becomes an object instanstiation of this class

Refer to point 2. in the documentation for cmpd_stmt about for loop index restrictions when you have a question statement in the body of a for statement

Member Function Documentation

void for_stmt::generate_code ( ostringstream &  quest_defns,
ostringstream &  program_code 
) [virtual]

generate_code(): Pure virtual functions takes 2 streams which as parameters code is written to both the streams the code in the quest_defns stream appears before the code in the program_code stream
